revised_title: Exploring the Catacombs of Rome and Naples
tldr: The author, John Monro, describes his observations and experiences exploring the catacombs of Rome and Naples. He discusses the various types of catacombs, their history, and the burial practices of early Christians. Monro also examines the connection between the catacombs and the ancient Roman burial customs, as well as the possible origins of these subterranean burial sites.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
